definition: to journey to India on a quest for the Buddhist scriptures/to learn by studying another's experience
classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]

sentences.english: The first lesson learned is that lessons can be learned.
sentences.chinese: 第一個條件是我們可以吸取經驗教訓。

sentences.english: Obtain any clearance to work or test permits that may be required from the appropriate authority.
sentences.chinese: 從主管部門獲取經其認可的從業或試驗資格證明。

sentences.english: As we do so, we must learn the lessons of the past.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時，我們必須從以往工作中吸取經驗教訓。

sentences.english: Companies should learn from these school mottos.
sentences.chinese: 公司應該向這些校訓取經。

sentences.english: Operations were performed via transsphenoidal approach to remove the tumors.
sentences.chinese: 手術採取經蝶入路行腫瘤切除術。

sentences.english: White Horse is a member not to be ignored in the family to Western Paradise for Buddhist Scriptures.
sentences.chinese: 白龍馬是取經集體中不容忽視的一員。

sentences.english: When we fail, we should make use of oue failure and learn from our experience.
sentences.chinese: 當我們失敗時，就該充分利用失敗，從中吸取經驗。

sentences.english: In fact, there are two major sects of Buddhism in India, the Mahayana and the Hinayana .
sentences.chinese: 傳說玄奘在印度取經時曾住在一座大乘佛寺內。

sentences.english: The bank is also gleaning knowledge from other corporations that invest in green solutions.
sentences.chinese: 銀行還向其他投資於綠色解決方案的公司取經。

sentences.english: Local governments also look abroad and learn from European efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 地方政府到海外取經，學習歐洲國家的節能手段。

sentences.english: The below map shows the route Xuanzang went to India.
sentences.chinese: 下面的地圖顯示當年唐三藏到天竺取經的路線。

sentences.english: "It's not shameful to learn from successful models, " Wang says.
sentences.chinese: “從成功案例中吸取經驗一點兒也不可恥，”王興說。

sentences.english: Fox is ready to take advice from a 9-year-old.
sentences.chinese: 福克斯公司將從一個9歲的孩子那裏取經。

sentences.english: We are all going to the west for Buddhist scriptures .
sentences.chinese: 我們幾個是去西天取經的。

sentences.english: Of course, Jing Chunhai also constantly went to Crew 5 to learn from their experiences.
sentences.chinese: 當然景春海也不斷地到5隊來走動取經。

sentences.english: But they can take some lessons from Soleri.
sentences.chinese: 但它們可以從索拉尼那兒吸取經驗教訓。

definition: lit. thousand ways, a hundred plans (idiom); by every possible means
to suffer untold hardships (idiom); trials and tribulations/with difficulty/after some effort
to proclaim/to make public or well known
to talk from one's personal experience/to use oneself as an example
to meet/to rendezvous/to merge/to link up/meeting/confluence
to seek knowledge/to study/to attend college
